full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Tier 3** workflow

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,



We are just about ready to go live with the Haven website!



Just one more thing to be done… I would like to add the video you will see
on the homepage but can’t quite work out the formatting. I don’t want the
video to appear too large on a desktop. I have looked at the format for
different devices and find that the bottom appears way too large. Can you
please fix this? Once done, we can go live.





Thanks



*Bonnie Sudirwan*

Marketing Communications Manager

bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

+61 0408331966 <+61%200408331966>

Customer Service: 1300 360 211
